location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus reports the theft of the most valuable of the kaleoons [kalian/kalioun, water-pipe] belonging to the Residency. He had procured a replacement from Shiraz and enclosed a copy of the bill (not transcribed).
